subject: Masters Golf Tournament
Golf
lead_paragraph: A year after his infamous “meltdown” on the back nine in the final round at Augusta National, Rory McIlroy returned to the tournament with a U.S. Open victory to his name and high hopes.
snippet: A year after his infamous “meltdown” on the back nine in the final round at Augusta National, Rory McIlroy returned to the tournament with a U.S. Open victory to his name and high hopes.
